data.title: THE HOUSE – D'A
data.meta_description: A filmmaker reflects on his house. He does not know where his house is situated. It might be anywhere in the world. It might take on any form or character. All that he knows is that it is his house, the place he may call home. Many people live there. Some are just passing through,...
data.text:
A filmmaker reflects on his house. He does not know where his house is situated. It might be anywhere in the world. It might take on any form or character. All that he knows is that it is his house, the place he may call home. Many people live there. Some are just passing through, staying there for just a few days. Others may decide to live there for a longer period. It is a house that is open to all…

With the support of:
